txt.en: Ingredients for tailoring are obtained from foresters who have converted raw hides into workable ingredients. You can trade with foresters directly or visit the auction hall for the treated materials. More mundane items used in tailoring can be purchased from the novice and expert tailor vendors.\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: Ingredient packs can also be found on the LOTRO Store.</rgb>
How can I get ingredients for tailoring?
